messages.title: It's Time for Action
messages.content: Save the NHS, 2nd EU Vote, Climate Action Now

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make the NHS public again and fully fund it.
Defend EU freedom for travel, work and study with an option to Remain.
Fight the climate crisis: we have 4 years left to stop dangerous levels of global warming that threaten our future.

mentions.candidate: Stuart is worth switching your vote for
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: It won’t survive 5 more years of austerity (from the Lib Dems) and sell-offs (from Labour).
mentions.tacticalSituation: They say it’s a two horse race but only we’re running in the right direction.

issues.brexitEurope: Defend EU freedom for travel, work and study with an option to Remain.
issues.environment: Fight the climate crisis: we have 4 years left to stop dangerous levels of global warming that threaten our future.
issues.health: Save the NHS: Make the NHS public again and fully fund it.

leaflet.personalStatement: Stuart is an NHS Charge Nurse at Addenbrookes Hospital. Of all the candidates, only he sees personally how cuts put lives at risk. That’s why he’s rallied crowds and led thousands-strong protests to save NHS funding. It’s just one of many campaigns over many years where Stuart’s shown what he can do. Now we need him to do it in Parliament.

examples: Green votes grew OVER 4x at the last General Election
Only Stuart stands for everything you believe in
